      • lastIndexOf

        public static final int lastIndexOf(java.lang.CharSequence s,
                                    char f,
                                    int offset,
                                    int limit)
        Exists only to add lastIndexOf(char,int) to classes like StringBuilder.
        Parameters:
        s - The haystack
        f - The needle
        offset - Index to start from
        limit - Index to stop at(inclusive; must be less than offset)
        Returns:
        The index of f or -1.

        public static final int lastIndexOf(java.lang.CharSequence s,
                                    char f,
                                    int offset)
        Exists only to add lastIndexOf(char,int) to classes like StringBuilder.
        Parameters:
        s - The haystack
        f - The needle
        offset - Index to start from
        Returns:
        The index of f or -1.

      • indexOf

        public static final int indexOf(java.lang.CharSequence s,
                                java.lang.CharSequence f,
                                int offset)
        Returns the index of the first occurrence such that startsWith(s,f,offset) is true.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to search
        f - The string to find
        offset - The starting index
        Returns:
        The index f is found or -1

      • startsWith

        public static final boolean startsWith(java.lang.CharSequence s,
                                       java.lang.CharSequence f,
                                       int offset)
        Adds startsWith() to StringBuilder.
        Parameters:
        s - String to search
        f - String to find
        offset - index to start the comparison
        Returns:
        true if the character sequence represented by the argument is a prefix of the character sequence represented by this string; false otherwise.

      • endsWith

        public static final boolean endsWith(java.lang.CharSequence s,
                                     java.lang.CharSequence f)
        Adds endsWith() to StringBuilder
        Parameters:
        s - String to search
        f - String to find
        Returns:
        true if the string ends with f
